english.segment1: Let there be no condemnation. For all who are fully known in Christ. Unspeakable grace for all the nations. By way of holy sacrifice
english.segment2: We worship with the sound. Of broken shackles. Falling to the ground
english.segment3: Chorus. Sanctified. I have been set free. Grace divine. Has swept me off my feet
english.segment4: No greater love has ever been known. Than He who came to find the lost. No greater sacrifice has been shown. Than He who laid upon the cross
english.segment5: Let all creation sing. For He has come. And HeÂ’s changed everything
english.segment7: Bridge. And I know that I will never be the same
